recipe.title: Shrimp Scallion Dumplings
ingredients: 3/4 pound peeled and deveined shrimp, finely chopped
Accompaniments: Asian-style hot mustard and reduced-sodium soy sauce for dipping
instructions: Stir together all ingredients, except wrappers, and 1/4 teaspoon salt. Put a rounded teaspoon filling in center of a wrapper. Lightly brush edge of wrapper with water, then fold in half (diagonally if square) and press to seal. Form a tortellini shape by moistening 1 corner and bringing 2 corners together, pressing them. Form remaining dumplings. Cook dumplings in 2 batches in a medium pot of gently simmering water until filling is just cooked, about 3 minutes per batch. Transfer with a slotted spoon to a platter. Keep warm, covered.

Cook dumplings in 2 batches in a medium pot of gently simmering water until filling is just cooked, about 3 minutes per batch. Transfer with a slotted spoon to a platter. Keep warm, covered.
